overview: "Couleurs | Orange" is a meditative film on the color orange. It explores orange as the original color for love, and how goldfish were named goldfish (instead of orange fish) because the coinage didn't exist yet. With beautiful, swirling imagery, "Couleurs | Orange" is a sweet, buoyant experimental short; an ode to a color we often take for granted. Special thanks to Bat-Sheva Guez for the use of her film 3F.
title: Couleurs | Orange
